name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kenneth Earl ROUDYBUSH, Appellant

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kenneth Earl ROUDYBUSH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of February, 2002, the Order of the Superior Court is reversed. See Commonwealth v. Gleason, 785 A.2d 983 (Pa.2001).
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
Justice SAYLOR dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
790 A.2d 313
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kenneth Earl ROUDYBUSH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted July 11, 2001.
Decided Feb. 22, 2002.
